replies.author: mengqs
replies.txt_content:
正版：我的电脑/c:/用户/（你电脑的用户名）/Appdata/Roaming/.minecraft/screenshorts 开启隐藏文件显示
盗版：游戏文件夹/.minecraft/screenshots

replies.author: 火柴盒先森
replies.txt_content:
路径：游戏文件夹/.minecraft/screenshots

给最佳~

replies.author: YZC
replies.txt_content:
minecraft文件夹里的screenshots
如果采纳，请给最佳
